item.title: GridFox - The Grid Layout Firefox Extension
item.description: GridFox is a Firefox extension that overlays a grid on any website. If you can open it in Firefox, you can put a grid on top of it. Itâ€™s easy to customize, allowing you to create the exact grid you designed your layout around. Via DigitalWeb http://www.puidokas.com/portfolio/gridfox/
